question: Which among the following statement is incorrect with regarding to World Food India?
option3: It brings the top food indutries together
explanation: World Food India is a biennial event to promote food processing sector at the global level. The first such event was conducted in 2017 and received wide success. The event created Brand India in global food map by positioning India as a World Food Factory.It was for the first time in India that all major policymakers and top industrialists across the globe in Food Processing Industries were together.
